Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler left the game against the Denver Nuggets with a right ankle sprain.
Tyler Herro led the team with 24 points, seven rebounds, and matched a career-high with 11 assists.
Nikola Jovic was benched in the second half but finished with 11 points, four rebounds, and three steals.
Post-Match Reflections: Erik Spoelstra shared an unclear update on Jimmy Butler's injury status, mentioning that further updates will be available after the team reaches Minnesota.
Nikola Jovic expressed his disappointment about being benched but remained hopeful for future opportunities.
Jaime Jaquez Jr. expressed his frustration about missing games due to illness but shared his perspective on the team's performance.
